api_list.api_description: Retrieve a list of available categories for Chuck Norris jokes.
Get details about a specific Pokémon ability by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id_or_name
required_parameters.description: The ID or name of the ability to retrieve.

query: Can you tell me the available categories of jokes? Also, can you provide me with information on the ability of Pokemon 19 Rattata?
